data.eml:eml: A new species of Pristimantis (Anura: Strabomantidae) from the Amazonian lowlands of northern Peru (Region Loreto and San Martín)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lehr, Edgar, Catenazzi, Alessandro, Rodríguez, Daniel (2009): A new species of Pristimantis (Anura: Strabomantidae) from the Amazonian lowlands of northern Peru (Region Loreto and San Martín). Zootaxa 1990: 30-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185534
